description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dhlkh","text":"This protocol describes a method for the isolation of pan-lymphocytes, pan-myeloid cells, and progenitors from human bone marrow aspirate. By providing defined media formulations, volumes at each step, and a defined dilution factor for density centrifugation, it yields consistent single-cell suspensions across samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ffqe9","text":"Remove the mononuclear cell layer from each tube with a transfer pipet to   tubes - mononuclear layers may be combined at this step to reduce the number of tubes to spin. Add cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution to a final volume of   and centrifuge the cell suspensions for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":224,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":266,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":271,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":274,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"etior","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"7DD5AC70E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"81584380E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"83F3FD00E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8898CCF0E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8AD0E2A0E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c06co","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in   cold DPBS-FBS-EDTA Solution and centrifuge the cell suspension for   at  ,  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":131,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2k4ur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"9846C710E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9BC78960E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"120","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A0CB6940E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A32F49E0E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3g1ec","text":"Remove the supernatant and re-suspend the cell pellet in cold   IMDM-FBS-PSQ Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dljtg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B7DBF3C0E9E511EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjfdp","text":"Count cells, and viability by using the NC-3000 cell counter. Calculate total viable cells and record below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doadp","text":"cell number: __________cells/mL, __________% viable","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nm7m","text":"final volume: __________mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m2rg","text":"𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑛𝑢𝑚𝑏𝑒𝑟 (𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠/𝑚𝐿) ∗ 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑖𝑙𝑖𝑡𝑦(%) ∗ 𝑓𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑜𝑙𝑢𝑚𝑒(𝑚𝐿) = 𝑡𝑜𝑡𝑎𝑙 𝑣𝑖𝑎𝑏𝑙𝑒 𝑐𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑠","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9v62","text":"Total Viable Cells: __________","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkl2d","text":"(Optional QC) Aliquot 2 x 106 cells to a 5mL Falcon tube and place on ice for subsequent flow cytometric analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chfu3","text":"Aliquot cells for analysis or experimentation, and then freeze down remaining in up to 3 x 107 aliquots using Cryostor CS10 Medium, a Mr. Frosty, and a   freezer ( -  aliquots, round down to the nearest 30 million cells and discard/freeze/use any left over cells). Record the number of vials frozen: __________.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":93,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":152,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":163,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":165,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d63u3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4DD7CBB0E9E611EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"528E00C0E9E611EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"5444FF90E9E611EB9B060B8DF5F4F07A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
